pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, June 13, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, June 13, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with Women Deliver and will hold a media availability. The Minister of International Development and La Francophonie, Marie-Claude Bibeau; Women Deliver President and CEO, Katja Iversen; and Ms. Gr√©goire Trudeau will also deliver remarks.

Famous Five Statues
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
